sentence: RELATED STORIES: Uber Adding Surcharge To Help Drivers Deal With Soaring Gas Prices Giant Eagle Extends Expiration Of Perks Through 2022 In Response To Gas Prices, Inflation Attorney General Josh Shapiro Says He Lacks Power To Investigate Price Gouging At The Pump Small Business Owners Absorbing Cost Of Rising Gas Prices For Now Spike In Gas Prices Making It Harder For Delivery And Rideshare Services As Gas Prices Soar, Pittsburghers Looking Into Alternative Forms Of Transportation "I would hope they would all come together and give us the authority we need to protect consumers at the pump, to protect them at the grocery store, or wherever they're seeing significant spikes in cost," said Shapiro.
title: Pennsylvania Average Gas Price Jumps To Over $4.30 Per Gallon

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM/AP) — A massive Republican primary field for governor in Pennsylvania is spurring growing discomfort among party leaders that a widely splintered primary vote could produce a winner who cannot beat Democrat Josh Shapiro in November’s general election.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania’s big GOP primary field for governor has party leaders worried

sentence: Just as notable, it found 44% of those polled remain undecided as to who will get their vote in the primary to face off against presumed Democratic nominee Josh Shapiro, who is unopposed for his party’s nomination.
author: WKOK Staff
title: Report: Mastriano Leads in New Gov Poll, Barletta Falls Behind

sentence: So when the Shapiro camp noticed "ENDORSED JOSH SHAPIRO," along with a check-marked ribbon, appeared at the end of Sims' new statewide ad, lawyers fired off a cease-and-desist order.
author: MARK SCOLFORO Associated Press
title: Shapiro: Dem candidate's ad wrongly implies endorsement
